mentions.context: The code is implemented using the Pytorch framework (Paszke et al., 2017) for tensor operation and gradient backward propagation.
The 3D reconstruction is rendered with ImageJ software (Schindelin et al., 2015).
All the trained CNNs are deployed with Python codes on Ubuntu 18.04.4
